com.favendo.queueSdk.queue

Class TaskQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.favendo.queueSdk.queue.TaskQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDependencyChangedListener

    public class TaskQueue
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDependencyChangedListener
    Queue, which handles dependent tasks in a convenient way.
